text:
Has Channing Tatum really forbid the Magic Mike Live dancers from having sex with women in the audience? That’s the outrageous claim being made in one of the tabloids, which says the actor has banned the male strippers from fraternizing with the customers. Gossip Cop, however, can exclusively set the record straight. A Las Vegas […]
